relation: Use this field to edit the expression to be evaluated. If an expression is selected in the editor, this field displays selection. This field is available in the Expression Mode.
Choose Java or Groovy from the drop-down list, to enable recognition of the respective syntax of expressions. This field is available only for Groovy scripts.
Type the group of statements to be evaluated. If a code fragment is selected in the editor, this field displays selection. This field is available in the Code Fragment Mode.
Click this button to evaluate the current expression or code fragment.
Click this button to close the dialog box.
Click this button to toggle to the Code Fragment Mode.
Click this button to toggle to the Expression Mode.
textBeforeTable: Use this dialog box to calculate values of expressions or code fragments during the debugging session.
